bibl.title: On the "Alexandros" of Euripides.
bibl.note: A. Was there an "agon" between Paris and Deiphobus? - B. Who tried to kill Paris and by what means? - C. Who speaks the Prologue? - D. What is the role of the gods in the action?
bibl.seg: Kovacs David, On the "Alexandros" of Euripides.
A. Was there an "agon" between Paris and Deiphobus? - B. Who tried to kill Paris and by what means? - C. Who speaks the Prologue? - D. What is the role of the gods in the action?
